name: What is Poppy Playtime
description: The game is set in an old abandoned toy factory. You play as a former employee of a company called Playtime Co. The company was a huge toy manufacturer, until all of the employees in the main factory disappeared. Now years later you return to the factory to investigate what really happened. You start in the front of the factory and slowly make your way throughout it, finding clues, and putting pieces together. Along the way you learn about the different toys that they made there, and about the history of the company. You make your way through the factory, searching for the poppy flower. You’ll run into various situations/puzzles to solve to get further on your quest. Eventually having to run away from Huggy Wuggy to get to the next part. This game has only one chapter to complete as of now, but the developers have confirmed there will be more to come. Right now the game is going for just $4.99 on Steam.

name: How to Play Poppy Playtime on Roblox
description: There are a couple different versions of Poppy Playtime on roblox, but not all of them are accurate to the actual game. Poppy Playtime! is  The top played version is called Poppy Playtime! By: Mikevalla20 and the second is Poppy Playtime By: DanzeeyNicky Another popular version is “Poppy Playtime” by DanzeeyNicky the third is Poppy Playtime By: RIP_HEROBRINE

name: Poppy Playtime! By Mikevalla20
description: This version’s graphics are probably most like the original game, and are probably best overall. The difference is that it’s not as complex as the original. There aren’t really any puzzles to solve, and there isn’t much physical interaction. In this version you wonder around the map finding keys to get into certain doors/pathways. Eventually you get to the part where Huggy Wuggy chases you, but the maze is a lot simpler. Just like in the original, you get to the red poppy, and go through to find the Poppy Playtime doll in her case. Once you click on her, the game ends.

name: Poppy Playtime By: DanzeeyNicky
description: Another popular version is “Poppy Playtime” by DanzeeyNicky. This version’s graphics are a lot simpler, but still very similar to the original. There is a little more interaction with this one, but still not really any puzzles to solve. Unlike the first version, this version actually has the GrabPack, but you can’t really use it on anything. Again, you wonder throughout the map to eventually find the red poppy flower. In this game Huggy Wuggy can kill you if he catches up to you, but it’s easy to stay away from him. Once you get to the poppy flower, you go through to find the Poppy doll just like in the first version. Nothing happens after you get to her though.

name: Poppy Playtime By: RIP_HEROBRINE
description: The third best version out as of now is called “Poppy Playtime” by RIP_HEROBRINE. This version has the simplest graphics out of all of them, but again, still looks very similar to the original. You can interact with more items around the map in this game, unlike the others. You can pick up the tapes and put them into the players. This version also has the GrabPack, and it works somewhat, but not entirely. You can only get so far in this version though, unfortunately. We tried it out, and couldn’t get past a door that you need the GrabPack to open. It was a bit glitchy, and so that was as far as we went.

name: Wrapping Up
description: This is all you need to know about the new Poppy Playtime game! Have you tried any of them out yet? Which do you like best? We hope you found this article helpful. Please feel free to drop a comment below if you have any questions or concerns!

name: Make A Friend and Huggy Wuggy Chase
description: With the power back on make your way back downstairs. Now the machinery below is running. Push the Make A Friend console button in the middle of the room. When you press this button the room’s machinery comes to life. Look to the left of the console and pull the three levers you see on the pieces machines. Wait for the pieces to move through the building process then pick up the completed toy at the end. Take the toy and place it on the scale next to the door with the “Nobody leaves without making a toy” sign. This door will open. Head through the open door and prepare yourself. From this point on Huggy Wuggy will start to chase you. Walk forward towards the darkened hallway. The creature will appear from out of the darkness as you get closer to it. Immediately turn and run to the end of the conveyor belt where you got your Make A Friend. The door there is open. Go through the vents while Huggy Wuggy chases you. /n At the end of the chase you will end up on a catwalk with nowhere to go.Above the catwalk is a yellow crate.Use both hands to pull it down.Huggy Wuggy will appear and the crate will drop onto it knocking it down below.
